title: Polymer Design for Gas Separation Membranes: Machine Learning-Based Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Short-Intensive Course on Mathematics-Based Polymer Design Methodologies, with Emphasis on Computational Modeling Techniques for Solving Real-World Chemical Spatial Problems

learning_goals: Learners can explain the correlation between polymer chemical structures and gas permeability.
Learners can design a polymer performance prediction process using machine learning models.
Learners can derive optimal membrane candidates using Bayesian-based molecular design algorithms.
Learners can analyze the impact of molecular dynamics simulation results on machine learning predictions.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
